column1: Iran's state-enforced religious norms have been shown to unintentionally push metal music culture into a form of secondary deviation, behavior that becomes more deviant because of punitive social reactions. https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/0048721X.2024.2316158#abstract

Participants with heart rates matching the tempo of vibrations and music experienced the strongest reductions in stress, annoyance, and cortisol while improving relaxation and mood. https://eds.p.ebscohost.com/eds/pdfviewer/pdfviewer?vid=0&sid=a2f5d5ef-8c95-4835-a582-7e3239e3d430%40redis

Due to helping maintain social ties and well-being, theater and music workshops have been used as non-drug interventions for helping older adults with neurocognitive disorders. https://eds.p.ebscohost.com/eds/pdfviewer/pdfviewer?vid=0&sid=ac990fef-4153-45db-b311-550512e84853%40redis

Walking with motivational music has been shown to improve gait parameters in older adults, linked to a positive effect on step width, stride length, hip joint angle, and ankle joint angle. https://eds.p.ebscohost.com/eds/pdfviewer/pdfviewer?vid=0&sid=6b7021f2-fb48-4209-9649-4b15907fb258%40redis
